Update Driver from libusbK to COM Port

To update and retrieve the COM ports, execute the following steps:

  1. Go to Device Manager. Expand the libusbK USB Devices and right click on the InnoPhase T2 Evaluation Board (Composite Parent). Click on Update Driver.

Figure 45: Device Manager – libusbK USB device

  1. On the new window, click on Let me pick from a list of available drivers on my computer option and click on Next.

Figure 46: Update Devices

  1. Select USB Composite Device and install the same for reinstalling COM posts.

Figure 47: Select Device Driver
